title: 进入minecraft出现错误 简单整合不是mod
author: zhanghannong
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game
A full error report has been saved to C:\Users\lenovo\Desktop\杂物\minecraft 1.4.6 简单整合V2.0\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-02-18_13.48.46-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 42cafa92 --------
Full report at:
C:\Users\lenovo\Desktop\杂物\minecraft 1.4.6 简单整合V2.0\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-02-18_13.48.46-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!
Generated 13-2-18 下午1:48
-- System Details --

 Type: Client (map_client.txt)
 Texture Pack: Default

 Vec3 Pool Size: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null
cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.RuntimeException: Unknown character '

replies.txt_content: 重装另一个版本，版本不对把

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
java不识别的字符，问答区不久前就见到过一样的问题。
整合包内有个mod出问题了吧。我想你还是把错误报告发上来吧：
C:\Users\lenovo\Desktop\杂物\minecraft 1.4.6 简单整合V2.0\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-02-18_13.48.46-client.txt
